subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis Colts’ former home is now a pile of rubble. Crews imploded the RCA Dome just after 9:30 a.m. by setting off 800 charges to bring down the facility’s upper floors in about 25 seconds.
snippet: The Indianapolis Colts’ former home is now a pile of rubble. Crews imploded the RCA Dome just after 9:30 a.m. by setting off 800 charges to bring down the facility’s upper floors in about 25 seconds.
